name: Bootstrap 4 Kit
description:
This kit is not an exhaustive set of components. I decided to focus on the components most important for building products. For example, I have ommited carousels and jumbotrons because those are not things I use often when building products.

If you see a "hide" icon next to a title that means there are hidden elements inside of the component. I do this to take advantage of Figma's auto layout feature and decrease the total count of components.
